nodes.text: This Zillo Beast was worshiped by the Benathy, a warrior species that saw the beast as their god and protector. It was awoken by the battle between the Benathy and the First Order. The Force-sensitive warlord Kylo Ren killed the Zillo before it could destroy his forces. The Benathy knelt before Ren as he stood atop their slain deity, submitting to the authority of the First Order and their dark side champion.
